mapper.select: select * from (select job_id,profession_id,company_id,job_name,highist_education,job_nature,is_hot,announce_time,state from job) j, job_info, (select company_id c_id,email,password,logo from com) c, com_info where j.job_id=job_info.job_info_id and j.company_id=c.c_id and c.c_id=com_info.company_info_id and industry_id=#{industryId} and profession_id=#{professionId} and city=#{city} and state=1 order by announce_time desc limit 0,10
